content: easy squirrel pattern using basic crochet stitches in us terminology in pdf 6 pages finished squirrel is ~7 5 inches tall using a 3 5 mm hook **difficulty** intermediate **stitches used** chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet tc - triple crochet increase - 2 single_crochet together in 1 st decrease - decrease single_crochet from 2 single_crochet to 1 single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch **materials** hooks 3 5mm 3 color yarns worsted or aran i used loops & threads impeccable aran and chocolate brown and tried out white pumpkin brown and heather a little black or dark brown yarn is needed to embroider the paws & nose scissors tapestry needle polyfill safety eyes 10 mm alternatively these can be embroidered the assembly takes a bit of time i ve included some pictures as a guide you can make squirrels in various colors and with varying nose colors there s a lot of room for variations i included some patterns for accessories as well beanie scarf and bowtie the acorns pattern is not included i hope you enjoy this little guy let me know if there are any errors/questions please credit pattern accordingly also the tail is a modification of a pattern from les mailles du rocher so credit this crocheter as well thanks
